jd: From: bala, Fisec bala@fisecglobal.net Reply to: bala@fisecglobal.net Title: Java Loyalty Lead DeveloperLocation: San Jose, CA - RemotePosition type: Fulltime/Contract Note: Client is looking for someone who worked on Oracle CrowdTwist loyalty product, as they are using the same loyalty engine. JD:Candidate should have an in-depth knowledge of how a loyalty system works.Has a very good hands-on experience in any Java based loyalty implementation - either in-house or out of market.Has helped any clients in driving in the right direction in choosing , designing, and implementing a loyalty system.Has any experience in analyzing and understanding of existing loyalty implementation.Has knowledge, can think/recommend from Martech perspective , such as non-transactional marketing events.Looking for SME & Tech Lead who will only focus on evaluationTech lead / Candidate will closely work with the current project teamTech lead will work as an individual contributor and will not be involved in any other activity like development/ enhancementOnce evaluation is complete, tech lead will be involved in leading the implementationLooking for an Onsite candidate. Preferred loc CA. The team often work from SF office Required Skills:Good Knowledge in the Loyalty systems and Implementations(any of both inhouse built or market)The candidate must have hands on experience in Java and Spring Boot microservicesHands on Experience in GCP
